body.p: Prior to the final of the last applicable project permit, a Certificate of Completion shall be submitted in accordance with Section 153.160.140 of the Zoning Code.

ul.li: It is encouraged that licensed design professionals be hired for the preparation of all plans submitted in fulfilment of this document's requirements. Such individuals should be consulted at the earliest stages for a coordinated project proposal.

It is encouraged that licensed design professionals be hired for the preparation of all plans submitted in fulfilment of this document's requirements. Such individuals should be consulted at the earliest stages for a coordinated project proposal

It is not the intent of this Manual to stifle creativity or the creative process. Deviations from specific guidelines will be considered by the DRC, and must exhibit a superior approach to fulfilling the goals and objectives of the Landscape Design Manual.
